description: This notification occurs when AP has accomplished a ping and
will report the result to user.
hwApPingResultSuccessCount:the successful times of the recent AP ping
hwApPingResultFailureCount: the failed times of recent AP ping
hwApPingResultAverageResponseTime: the average response time of recent AP ping.
hwApPingResultMinimumResponseTime: the minimum response time of recent AP ping.
hwApPingResultMaximumResponseTime: the maximum response time of recent AP ping.

event.Summary: AP $v4 accomplished ping and report result to user
